suggestedFixes.fix: Create above-fold hero with headline (8 words max), subhead (20 words), primary CTA button, and product screenshot
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear value prop + visual proof drives immediate engagement

suggestedFixes.fix: Add trust bar below hero: customer logos, user count badge, security certifications, and 5-star rating
suggestedFixes.rationale: Social proof reduces risk perception for small business owners

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom tab bar with 4 items: Home, Features, Pricing, Start Free Trial
Use 3-column pricing table with highlighted 'Popular' tier, annual discount badge, and feature comparison
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear tier differentiation guides decision making

suggestedFixes.rationale: Professional color palette builds SaaS credibility

suggestedFixes.rationale: Modern, readable type system improves scanning
